result.execSummary:
All charges against Michael James Rottmann in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Michael James Rottmann is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael James Rottmann

records.addlTxt: Defendant Michael James Rottmann in court, in custody.  Attorney Tedia K. Gamino in court for Michael James Rottmann.  Attorney Jacob A. Maule in court for State of Wisconsin. Pursuant to plea negotiations on 22CM2156 and on motion of State, Court ordered case dismissed.

Defense contacted the Court and State via email to schedule PROMPT DISPOSITION hearing. 
Plea/Sentencing hearing scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 08:30 am. 
Hearing will be held IN-PERSON before Judge Dee, Branch 37. 
Court vacated Scheduling Conference date.

Defendant Michael James Rottmann not in court, in custody.  Attorney Tedia K. Gamino in court for Michael James Rottmann.  Prosecuting attorney Ryan Jay Michaels in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Pre-trial conference held. Defense counsel has discovery and needs an offer from the State and requests a scheduling conference.  Case is adjourned to Br. 29.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Michael James Rottmann
Current: 5105 S 27th Street, Greenfield, WI 53211   (Effective: 08-25-2022)
Prior: 2112 South 76th Street, West Allis, WI 53219

Court ordered no contact with ASK (DOB: 4/20/1998)
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Michael James Rottmann appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Fred Richardson III appeared by video for Michael James Rottmann.  Attorney Michael J. Odden appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kiefer, Branch 29. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION. 
This hearing MAY be streamed live on Dacast: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/104d9737-ba2f-8811-9083-aed2135824d9
Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
